title: I'm inactive please help me
body:
My other account got inactivity for some reason will it stop being inactivity or is it like a permanent bann
I only did not help as surport for only one time to one person because he was very selfish and blamed everyone mistake on me

replies.body: Can you expand on what you mean by "inactivity"? I'm not quite sure I understand what's going on.
Like it says instead of logging in it says you account is inactive and won't let you in the game ):

In that case, I recommend reaching out to our account specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate this further. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
How do your support tickets work
That's a pretty big topic. Do you have any specific questions about support tickets?
